data.name: Lua Alchemist & Failure
data.title: Excersied in Lua programming, For the sole porpuse of Exploiting in ROBLOX. Ironic, Right?
content: Made plenty of my own scripts, With a few of them being a {{pretty good success}} on my part.
During 2021, I decided to go away from making exploits like {{Autofarms}}, {{Kill-Auras}}, Etc. And mostly focused on {{'FE'}}, or 'Filtering Enabled' Scripts.
Which if you're not familiar with, Allows you to do {{a wide variety of things}}, and all you needed except for scripting knowledge, is {{creativity}}.

Although most of these scripts were terrible, Unlike the ones i've made closer to the end of this era as ROBLOX Introduced {{Byfron}}, I don't regret any of it as it was my passion for a couple of years and i've met some great people along the way, Who have helped me get more knowledge, And were {{great companions}}. Which in the end is all that matters.

data.name: Python Stomper
data.title: Well, ROBLOX Exploiting has gone to shit. Let's try Python!
content: What really inspired me is seeing all the Python multi-tools people made in CMD, Along with Discord Bots/Self-bots, So, I decided why not {{try it}}.
I went around making a {{Parental PIN Cracker}} for ROBLOX, There i go again, Being {{Unethical}}, Silly me.
This PIN Crackerk essentially {{did work}}, But was {{useless}} as it would get {{blocked from the ROBLOX API}} for spam. Cool, Right?
But, Even if this wasn't the case, it was again {{pretty dumb}} as if i were to even use it, I would need {{access to an account first}}.
Let's try to make a Discord Self bot! (Spoiler: It actually did work)

Again, Being unethical. I wanted to make a {{Self-bot}}, Not for {{Nuking}}, Although {{i did add that feature}}, ecsdi. But instead as a Discord bot i could run on my {{Alt-Account}} and use it in {{Group-Chats}} rather than servers.
It was mainly {{for fun}}, And just had silly commands based on {{spamming gifs/messages}}, saying {{pre-coded sentences}}, having a {{'Rate'}} system using {{random}}, Example:
{{user:}} -StupidRate {{@User 2}}
bot: {{@User 2}} is (Random number from 1-100)% stupid!
It worked in a pretty simple matter, and as time went on i added more and more commands to it. So we will call that a {{success}}, And a {{learning experience}} for Python.
On the side, I also made a Auto-Reply Self-Bot, but this is irrelevant.
Note:

after this project, I started making a {{Multi-tool}}, That went from something useless, to something... Semi-useless but pretty dang cool. I'll post a image in {{Projects}}. Don't expect anything too crazy though, Lmao.

data.name: Lua Wizard (Part 2?)
data.title: Back after a few years, Let's see how much knowledge i have in {{Lua}}.
content: Well, I've gotten a way to Exploit again. Let's try to make a {{FE}} Sniper script! *boom!* That was actually... Pretty easy!

It turns out i was pretty successful, Despite being Rusty. But now the real test begins, My friend {{Galles}} asks me to make a {{ROBLOX}} game with him, And as i need to get back to {{Lua}} anyway, I agree. Yet, This time from an {{ethical side}}.

And... It was really painful. Damn, I really am rusty at this, Huh? As of right now i am still 'developing' a 'Hub' game, and it's getting easier by day i do it. Well, When i feel like it at least, Lmao. Sorry bro.
